chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para: The Seam RESTEasy module requires a CDI compliant server such as JBoss Application Server to run on. In addition, Seam RESTEasy depends on the RESTEasy framework. RESTEasy can either be a part of the server or bundled with the web application.

To use the Seam RESTEasy module, add seam-resteasy and seam-resteasy-api jars into the web application. If using Maven, add the following dependency into the web application's pom.xml configuration file.
